## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description               | Type                                      | Default      |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `date`   | --        | The Date object to format | `Date`                                    | `new Date()` |
| `format` | `format`  | Format option type             | `"full" \| "long" \| "medium" \| "short"` | `'full'`     |
